DOC.brief_summary: Biodegradable scaffold is an accepted and commercialized medical alternative choice for bone regeneration. In this project we will used our new invention, porous starch- hydroxyapatite composite, for in vivo clinical trial.
DOC.brief_title: In Vivo Clinical Trial of Porous Starch - Hydroxyapatite Composite Biomaterials for Bone Regeneration
DOC.detailed_description: The products were prepared from medical grade Thai rice starch mixed with high purity (>97%) hydroxyapatite powder from fresh cow bone, and already passed in vivo animal biocompatility test, then processed by freeze-drying. There were 44 volunteers from orthopedic and neurosurgical division, 4 and 40 patients, respectively.
